snippet: Ecosystems of multiple species that interact with one another and their physical environments are essential for human societies.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Richard Pearson, a scientist at the American Museum of Natural History, warns that more and more species of animals and plants are becoming extinct; asserts that many species are needed to maintain healthy ecosystems; calls for effective environmental legislation that protects entire ecosystems.
lead_paragraph: Ecosystems of multiple species that interact with one another and their physical environments are essential for human societies.
